channel.title: CVE Feed for revolutbusiness -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for revolutbusiness -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-8678|2024-09-25T13:23:50.813Z -- revolutbusiness -- revolut%20gateway%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: The Revolut Gateway for WooCommerce plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized modification of data due to a missing capability check on the /wc/v3/revolut REST API endpoint in all versions up to, and including, 4.17.3. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to mark orders as completed.

item.title: CVE-2024-8678|2024-09-25T06:49:00.721Z -- revolutbusiness -- revolut%20gateway%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: The Revolut Gateway for WooCommerce plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized modification of data due to a missing capability check on the /wc/v3/revolut REST API endpoint in all versions up to, and including, 4.17.3. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to mark orders as completed.
